headlines.description: Sampdoria came from behind to record their biggest win of the season and move five points clear of the relegation zone with a resounding 5-1 victory
headlines.shortLinkText: Sampdoria thrash Brescia to boost Serie A survival bid

headlines.description: Cristiano Ronaldo continued his superb scoring form as Juventus won 2-1 away to AS Roma on Sunday and moved two points clear at the top of Serie A.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo strikes again as Juventus go top with win
